title: Banduk (Captioned)
creator_credit: Di Drew, Penelope Spence and National Nine Network
brief_description: Banduk, a young Aboriginal girl, and her friends discover that the “friendly” proprietors of an ice-cream van are smuggling native animals, including the sacred red-collared parakeet, out of Australia. This delightful story was filmed on location in Arnhem Land.
creator_credit_for_label: Di Drew, Penelope Spence and National Nine Network
